sentences.en: Acquisition goes on night and day - smoothly, subtly, imperceptibly.
sentences.cn: 东西没日没夜地收进来 —— 顺畅 、 隐秘 、 不知不觉.
她的表情有些变化,但轻微得几乎觉察不到.

sentences.en: But just remember, you should bow imperceptibly lower than he does.
sentences.cn: 但千万记住, 你鞠的躬要略比他低些.

sentences.en: But the cavalry officer melted imperceptibly out of her existence.
sentences.cn: 可是这位骑兵军官毫无察觉地消融在她的生存范围之外了.

sentences.en: Earthquakes typically occur along the jigsaw-puzzle piecesof Earth's crust, called plates, which move relative to one another, mostof the time at an imperceptibly slow pace.
sentences.cn: 地震一般发生在犬牙交错的一块块地壳（板块）间。 这些板块相向运动，大部分时间我们察觉不到它们的移动。

sentences.en: He approached imperceptibly the gloomy recess.
sentences.cn: 他不知不觉地走到了幽暗的山岔.

sentences.en: Imperceptibly, the boat had slowly turned.
sentences.cn: 船慢慢地在转弯, 简直使人不觉得.

sentences.en: In this way the torso oscillates almost imperceptibly with the breath.
sentences.cn: 通过这种方式.躯干随着呼吸不知不觉地振动.

sentences.en: Let the student fall into the disposition, the individuality bloodline - ism rules imperceptibly.
sentences.cn: 让学生无形中陷入了性格 、 个性血统论的条条框框.

sentences.en: Meanwhile , the moon moved imperceptibly across the sky, showing no sign of her trail.
sentences.cn: 月儿不出声地走着, 看不见她的来路与归处.
莱伊小姐几乎察觉不出地微微一笑.
不知不觉地出现了一些新问题.

sentences.en: The breath ebbed from him almost imperceptibly.
sentences.cn: 呼吸几乎是不知不觉地从他喉咙里微弱下去.

sentences.en: The heaven gives in the imperceptibly but inexorably you I arrange.
sentences.cn: 上苍在冥冥之中给你我的安排.

sentences.en: Time fled, and she was surprised to find the year passed imperceptibly.
sentences.cn: 光阴飞逝, 她诧异地发觉一年不知不觉就过去了.

sentences.en: To weaken, injure, or impair, often by degrees or imperceptibly; sap.
sentences.cn: 逐渐损坏;暗中破坏:削弱 、 伤害或损害, 常是逐渐地或很轻微地; 使衰弱.

words.tran_cn: 细微；目所不见；无法感知

trans.tran_cn: 无感觉地，感觉不到地，不知不觉地，极微地
